title: Below Deck Med's Hannah Ferrier
itunes:title: Below Deck Med's Hannah Ferrier
itunes:subtitle: Danny chats with Hannah Ferrier of Below Deck Mediterranean. They talk about the premiere episode, the new chef, her friendship with Kate from the original Below Deck, and SO much more! Danny also kicks off Pride month with a brief red carpet interview...
description:
Danny chats with Hannah Ferrier of Below Deck Mediterranean. They talk about the premiere episode, the new chef, her friendship with Kate from the original Below Deck, and SO much more! Danny also kicks off Pride month with a brief red carpet interview with Ross Matthews and Carson Kressley of Drag Race.


Ross/Carson: 34:00ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
